member.name: P:ProjectIAPI_Core.ViewModels.Login.Email
member.summary: The email or phone number of the user.

member.name: P:ProjectIAPI_Core.ViewModels.Login.Password
member.summary: The password of the user.

member.name: P:ProjectIAPI_Core.ViewModels.Login.IsSsoUser

member.name: T:ProjectIAPI_Core.ViewModels.UserUpsert
member.summary: Represents the data required to insert or update a user in the system.

member.name: P:ProjectIAPI_Core.ViewModels.UserUpsert.Id
member.summary: The ID of the user. Use 0 for insert, or a positive value for update.

member.name: P:ProjectIAPI_Core.ViewModels.UserUpsert.FirstName
member.summary: The first name of the user. Required field.

member.name: P:ProjectIAPI_Core.ViewModels.UserUpsert.LastName
member.summary: The last name of the user. Required field.

member.name: P:ProjectIAPI_Core.ViewModels.UserUpsert.PhoneNumber
member.summary: The phone number of the user. Optional field.

member.name: P:ProjectIAPI_Core.ViewModels.UserUpsert.Email
member.summary: The email address of the user. Required field.

member.name: P:ProjectIAPI_Core.ViewModels.UserUpsert.Password
member.summary: The password for the user account. Optional for updates.

member.name: P:ProjectIAPI_Core.ViewModels.UserUpsert.UserType
member.summary: The type of user account (e.g., 1 for regular user).

member.name: P:ProjectIAPI_Core.ViewModels.UserUpsert.Gender
member.summary: The gender of the user (e.g., 1 for male, 2 for female).

member.name: P:ProjectIAPI_Core.ViewModels.UserUpsert.ProfilePic
member.summary: The URL or path to the user's profile picture. Optional field.

member.name: P:ProjectIAPI_Core.ViewModels.UserUpsert.Bio
member.summary: A brief bio or description of the user. Optional field.

member.name: P:ProjectIAPI_Core.ViewModels.UserUpsert.Location
member.summary: The location of the user. Optional field.

member.name: P:ProjectIAPI_Core.ViewModels.UserUpsert.CreatedBy
member.summary: The ID of the user who created or is updating this record.

member.name: P:ProjectIAPI_Core.ViewModels.UserUpsert.IsActive
member.summary: Indicates whether the user account is active.

member.name: P:ProjectIAPI_Core.ViewModels.UserUpsert.IsDeleted
member.summary: Indicates whether the user account is marked as deleted.

member.name: P:ProjectIAPI_Core.ViewModels.UserUpsert.IsSsoUser
member.summary: Indicates whether the user account uses SSO login.

member.name: P:ProjectIAPI_Core.ViewModels.UserUpsert.SocialLink
member.summary: The URL to the user's social media profile. Optional field.

member.name: T:ProjectIAPI_Core.ViewModels.UpsertUserResult
member.summary: Represents the result of an upsert operation on a user.

member.name: P:ProjectIAPI_Core.ViewModels.UpsertUserResult.ResultType
member.summary: The result type of the operation (e.g., 0 for insert success, 1 for update success).

member.name: P:ProjectIAPI_Core.ViewModels.UpsertUserResult.ResultMessage
member.summary: The message describing the result of the operation.

member.name: P:ProjectIAPI_Core.ViewModels.UpsertUserResult.UserId
member.summary: The ID of the user affected by the operation.
